text: 1 1/2 lb boneless, skinless chicken thighs, cut into 1-inch pieces
label: ingredient

text: 1 large red onion, cut into wedges
label: ingredient

text: 1. Heat oven to 425°F. Line a sheet pan with parchment.
label: step

text: 2. In a large bowl, toss chicken with olive oil, honey, garlic, salt, pepper, and paprika. Let sit 10 minutes while you prep vegetables.
label: step

text: 3. In another bowl, toss onion, broccolini, and mushrooms with 1 tbsp olive oil, chili flakes, and a pinch of salt.
label: step

text: 4. Arrange chicken on one side of the tray and vegetables on the other side; roast 18 minutes.
label: step

text: 5. Meanwhile, whisk soy sauce, vinegar, cornstarch, sesame oil, and 2 tbsp water. If very thick, add 1 more tbsp water.
label: step

text: 6. Remove tray, toss chicken with sauce, and return to oven for 8 to 10 minutes, until glossy and cooked through.
label: step

text: 7. Taste vegetables; season with extra salt if needed.
label: step

text: 8. Serve over rice and top with scallions and sesame seeds.
label: step

text: Note: If your pan is crowded, split between 2 trays so everything roasts instead of steams.
label: note
